p: It has been reported that findings of X‚Äêray myelography in dogs with intervertebral disc diseases (IVDD), especially deficits of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) line due to swelling of the spinal cord, would associate with prognosis. Similar myelographic images could be obtained using MR myelography (MRM). The purpose of this study is to evaluate MRM findings in dogs with IVDD would associate with severity of neurological signs.
